channel.title: Interview on TRIZ Innovation India
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on TRIZ Innovation India

item.title: TRIZ India Podcast Murali Interviews Darrell Mann
item.description: Murali Loganathan, a research scholar at Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, India had a tete-a-tete podcast recording with Darrell Mann, CEO and Technical Director of Systematic Innovation Ltd. Enjoy! Darrell Mann and Murali Loganathan tete-a-tete about TRIZ Over a few drinks, pool and lively music, Murali got Darrell to talk about Darrell's foray into TRIZ, his views and reservations on how ARIZ should be, his reaction on what would Altshuller say if he had been alive today?
